attributes.action: Protect NHS from privatization or sale to foreign investors or companies
attributes.additional_details: WE are lucky to have a NHS system that protects all citizens. ALthough underfunded, this can be remedied, not by sale but raising additional taxes.
attributes.background: NHS Should remain funded by British Government and remain free access to all British nationals and never be sold for privatization to foreign or domestic investors.  Raise taxes to fund to continue NHS growth and success.
